original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.2. Sahetukadukādi, Kusalattika
analyzed: sa hetuka duka ādi kusala ttika

original: Nasahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa hetukam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sa hetukaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasahetukaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa hetukam na akusalam dhammam paccayā sa hetukaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sahetukam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na ahetukam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasahetukaṁ naabyākatañca naahetukaṁ naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato
analyzed: na sahetukam na abyākatam ca na ahetukam na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ abyākataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetusampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā …pe… hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā pe hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva sa hetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo sahetukassa ceva
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ sa hetukassa ca iva

original: na ca hetussa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ceva naahetuko
analyzed: na ca hetussa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ

original: ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa kusalassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa
analyzed: ca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva sa hetukassa kusalassa ca sa hetukassa ca iva na ca hetussa

original: kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na ca hetu na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva sa hetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nahetu ceva naahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetu ceva na ahetukaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu na kusalaḥ ca dhammā hetussa ca iva sa hetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava

original: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva sa hetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava

original: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ hetussa ca iva sa hetukassa ca abyākatassa

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare
analyzed: dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare

original: upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava.
analyzed: upanissaye nava kamme tīṇi natthiyāḥ vigate nava
